title: Refund a gift?
body: Is this possible? this guy sent me a gift and i really dont want it and i blocked him but its still in my inventory on my one of my favorite champions and its kind of like a permanent mark on my account so i was wondering if someone could just refund the guy his rp and take the skin form me?

replies.body: You can write in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) to get the gift removed! If you have the person who sent it write in as well, they could get the RP back. If not, we can still remove it but they may not get the refund if they don't write in as well.
Don't want it then don't use it?
